title: How to Treat Dark Circles & Under Eye Puffiness | AVEENO®
description:
Under eye bags occur when tissue and muscle around the eyes become weak, causing puffiness, and many factors can lead to this, such as lack of sleep to genetics to poor nutrition. Dark circles is the resulting skin tone, as blood vessels are more visible.

Here are simple natural beauty skin care tips to prevent and treat the causes of dark circles and puffy eyes.

1) Get enough sleep. It is recommended to get 7 and a half to 9 hours of sleep.

2) Take care of aging skin, staying hydrated and using anti-aging skin care products to target visible signs of aging.

3) Eat a rich, varying diet to get all necessary nutrients and vitamins

4) Use cucumbers over the eyes to help alleviate immediate puffiness

Incorporating the right anti-aging skin care products for your skin type is also key to help combat dark circles and under eye puffiness. AVEENO® Positively Radiant Targeted Tone Corrector with Vitamin A helps to even skin tone and fade the look of dark spots on skin, formulated with ACTIVE NATURALS® Soy Complex.

asset.author: aveeno

transcripts: Burning the candle at both ends? We don't always get the sleep our body needs and that can lead to bags under the eyes or dark circles. Bags appear when muscles and tissue around your eyes weaken and fall below them creating puffiness. Dark circles refers to the skin tone under the eye often caused by the visibility of blood vessels around your eyes. Lack of sleep can cause blood vessels to dilate making them more visible since the skin under your eyes can be up to 8 times thinner than your hands and feet. The average adult needs from seven and a half to nine hours of sleep. Aging also plays a role along with other factors like genetics and nutrition. It's important to maintain a diet with lots of variety to make sure you're covering all your nutrients . If you're not getting enough iron or vitamin B12, you're bodily tissues may become poorly oxiginated which shows up under the eyes. Iron is best absorbed with vitamin C. For a quick fix try cucumbers. Apply one quarter inch thick slice to the eyes the coolness with soothe the tissue around your eyes and try the Aveeno positively radiant targeted tone corrector with vitamin A to reduce the look of dark spots. Natural beauty secrets brought to you by the makers of Aveeno.
